price: The worst of moving creatures[32] before Allah are those who persist in disbelief, so they do not believe,
arabic: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
